displayName.Description: The display name for the schedule definition.

status.Description: This read-only field specifies the status of an accessReview.

descriptionForAdmins.Description: The description provided by the access review creator and visible to admins.

descriptionForReviewers.Description: The description provided by the access review creator to be shown to reviewers.

createdBy.Description: The user or other identity who created this review.

scope.Description: This is used to define what to include in scope of the review. The scope definition includes the resourceId and roleDefinitionId.

reviewers.Description: This is the collection of reviewers.

backupReviewers.Description: This is the collection of backup reviewers.

reviewersType.Description: This field specifies the type of reviewers for a review. Usually for a review, reviewers are explicitly assigned. However, in some cases, the reviewers may not be assigned and instead be chosen dynamically. For example managers review or self review.

instances.Description: This is the collection of instances returned when one does an expand on it.

mailNotificationsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether sending mails to reviewers and the review creator is enabled.

reminderNotificationsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether sending reminder emails to reviewers are enabled.

defaultDecisionEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether reviewers are required to provide a justification when reviewing access.

justificationRequiredOnApproval.Description: Flag to indicate whether the reviewer is required to pass justification when recording a decision.

defaultDecision.Description: This specifies the behavior for the autoReview feature when an access review completes.

autoApplyDecisionsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether auto-apply capability, to automatically change the target object access resource, is enabled. If not enabled, a user must, after the review completes, apply the access review.

recommendationsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether showing recommendations to reviewers is enabled.

instanceDurationInDays.Description: The duration in days for an instance.

pattern.Description: Access Review schedule definition recurrence pattern.

range.Description: Access Review schedule definition recurrence range.

type.Description: The recurrence type : weekly, monthly, etc.

interval.Description: The interval for recurrence. For a quarterly review, the interval is 3 for type : absoluteMonthly.

type.Description: The recurrence range type. The possible values are: endDate, noEnd, numbered.

numberOfOccurrences.Description: The number of times to repeat the access review. Required and must be positive if type is numbered.

startDate.Description: The DateTime when the review is scheduled to be start. This could be a date in the future. Required on create.

endDate.Description: The DateTime when the review is scheduled to end. Required if type is endDate

resourceId.Description: ResourceId in which this review is getting created

roleDefinitionId.Description: This is used to indicate the role being reviewed

principalType.Description: The identity type user/servicePrincipal to review

assignmentState.Description: The role assignment state eligible/active to review

inactiveDuration.Description: Duration users are inactive for. The value should be in ISO  8601 format (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations).This code can be used to convert TimeSpan to a valid interval string: XmlConvert.ToString(new TimeSpan(hours, minutes, seconds))

status.Description: This read-only field specifies the status of an access review instance.

startDateTime.Description: The DateTime when the review instance is scheduled to be start.

endDateTime.Description: The DateTime when the review instance is scheduled to end.

displayName.Description: The display name for the schedule definition.

status.Description: This read-only field specifies the status of an accessReview.

descriptionForAdmins.Description: The description provided by the access review creator and visible to admins.

descriptionForReviewers.Description: The description provided by the access review creator to be shown to reviewers.

createdBy.Description: The user or other identity who created this review.

scope.Description: This is used to define what to include in scope of the review. The scope definition includes the resourceId and roleDefinitionId.

reviewers.Description: This is the collection of reviewers.

backupReviewers.Description: This is the collection of backup reviewers.

reviewersType.Description: This field specifies the type of reviewers for a review. Usually for a review, reviewers are explicitly assigned. However, in some cases, the reviewers may not be assigned and instead be chosen dynamically. For example managers review or self review.

instances.Description: This is the collection of instances returned when one does an expand on it.

mailNotificationsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether sending mails to reviewers and the review creator is enabled.

reminderNotificationsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether sending reminder emails to reviewers are enabled.

defaultDecisionEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether reviewers are required to provide a justification when reviewing access.

justificationRequiredOnApproval.Description: Flag to indicate whether the reviewer is required to pass justification when recording a decision.

defaultDecision.Description: This specifies the behavior for the autoReview feature when an access review completes.

autoApplyDecisionsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether auto-apply capability, to automatically change the target object access resource, is enabled. If not enabled, a user must, after the review completes, apply the access review.

recommendationsEnabled.Description: Flag to indicate whether showing recommendations to reviewers is enabled.

instanceDurationInDays.Description: The duration in days for an instance.

principal.Description: Principal associated with the decision record. Can be AccessReviewDecisionUserIdentity or AccessReviewDecisionServicePrincipalIdentity

resource.Description: Resource associated with this decision record.

recommendation.Description: The feature- generated recommendation shown to the reviewer.

decision.Description: The decision on the approval step. This value is initially set to NotReviewed. Approvers can take action of Approve/Deny

justification.Description: Justification provided by approvers for their action

reviewedDateTime.Description: Date Time when a decision was taken.

applyResult.Description: The outcome of applying the decision.

appliedDateTime.Description: The date and time when the review decision was applied.

id.Description: The id of principal whose access was reviewed.

displayName.Description: The display name of the user whose access was reviewed.

appId.Description: The appId for the service principal entity being reviewed

type.Description: The type of decision target : User/ServicePrincipal

userPrincipalName.Description: The user principal name of the user whose access was reviewed.

type.Description: The type of decision target : User/ServicePrincipal

id.Description: The id of resource associated with a decision record.

displayName.Description: The display name of resource associated with a decision record.
